{"rule":"NUMBERS_IN_WORDS","sentence":"^\\QThe Langevin equation model of agent-based model is defined as \\E(?:Dummy|Ina|Jimmy-)[0-9]+\\Q, where \\E(?:Dummy|Ina|Jimmy-)[0-9]+\\Q is the position of the \\E(?:Dummy|Ina|Jimmy-)[0-9]+\\Qth particle, \\E(?:Dummy|Ina|Jimmy-)[0-9]+\\Q is the concentration of the chemo-attractant, \\E(?:Dummy|Ina|Jimmy-)[0-9]+\\Q is the chemotactic sensitivity, which is a key parameter that determines the strength of the chemotactic response of the particles to the chemo-attractant.\\E$"}
